notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: This research was undertaken as part of Annabelle Workmanâ€™s Doctor of Philosophy candidature. As such, all authors were involved in the research design. Annabelle Workman wrote the initial draft. Grant Blashki, Kathryn Bowen, David J. Karoly and John Wiseman significantly contributed to several revisions of the paper prior to submission.
